title: Stencil style font need identification for if possible (might be a bespoke graphic though I suspect not).
content:
This is a logo that needs some design tweaking.  
Only problem is it's not a font any more. Anyone good with naming stencil style fonts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415025558im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logofont_4587.png)
author: Rawshock Design

comments.content: Designed by Milton Glaser no less. Thanks very much ;)
